name: taxa-4(20),11-dien-5alpha-yl acetate,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (10beta-hydroxylating)
definition: Taxa-4(20),11(12)-dien-5alpha-yl acetate + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> Taxa-4(20),11(12)-dien-5alpha-acetoxy-10beta-ol + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
